answers.answer: Hi there!A healthy diet would be low fat and moderate carbohydrate/ protein diet with plenty of fruits and vegetables. If diabetes and cholesterol are associated, these may need to be controlled as well. In addition, regular moderate exercise, avoiding smoking etc are changes that would be beneficial.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: i have undergone anjoplasty recently. i have also sinus problem. what should be a healthy diet for me
title: healthy diet
